issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
I have a widget with a controller `tvs`.
In the widget.js I set `exports.baseController = "tvs"`
Although the root element in tvs is `TableViewSection`, I get the following error.

{code:java}
[ERROR] :  Error with <Widget> at line 23
[ERROR] :  Ti.UI.TableView child elements must be one of the following: [_ProxyProperty._Lists.HeaderView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.FooterView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.HeaderPullView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.Search,Ti.UI.SearchBar,Ti.UI.Android.SearchView,Ti.UI.RefreshControl,Ti.UI.TableViewRow,Ti.UI.TableViewSection,Ti.UI.iOS.PreviewContext]
[ERROR] :  Alloy compiler failed
{code}
fields.summary: Android: baseController does not expose the element type
fields.environment:
Alloy 1.7.35
Titanium SDK 5.2.2.GA
Mac OS X 10.11.4

comments.body:
Hello, 

Please provide a full regeneratable sample code. Looks like the issue is with your Ti.UI.TableView child elements. Which must be one of the following: [_ProxyProperty._Lists.HeaderView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.FooterView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.HeaderPullView,_ProxyProperty._Lists.Search,Ti.UI.SearchBar,Ti.UI.Android.SearchView,Ti.UI.RefreshControl,Ti.UI.TableViewRow,Ti.UI.TableViewSection,Ti.UI.iOS.PreviewContext]

Please check. See anything else is in there beside tham.

Regards,
Sharif.

Hello Sharif,
Added widget-test.zip to demonstrate the issue. 

Regards,
Onur
